systemMessage:
TwisterLab MCP Tools
TwisterLab MCP Server with 21 tools across 4 agents.
- Monitoring: health_check, get_system_metrics, list_containers
- Maestro: chat, generate, orchestrate, list_agents, analyze
- Database: execute_query, list_tables, describe_table, db_health
- Cache: cache_get, cache_set, cache_delete, cache_keys, cache_stats

Always check system health before diagnosing issues.

customCommands.name: audit
customCommands.prompt: Analyze code for security and performance issues
